FURNACE.MACROS.runAsGMTooltip:
This will cause the macro to be executed by the GM user when players execute it.
For security reasons, only applies to GM created macros with no other owners
FURNACE.MACROS.highlight.name: Highlight Macro Codes
FURNACE.MACROS.highlight.hint: If enabled, macro codes will be highlighted. Note that this might be incompatible with other code editor modules.
